title: Your disabilities implications areas
question: Do any of these conditions or illnesses affect you in any of the following areas?
optionVisionHint: For example blindness or partial sight
optionHearingHint: For example deafness or partial hearing
optionMobilityHint: For example walking short distances or climbing stairs
optionDexterityHint: For example lifting and carrying objects, using a keyboard
optionSociallyHint: For example associated with autism, attention deficit disorder or Asperger's syndrome
optionOtherDetails: Please give details of your disability

required.summary: You need to choose at least one option for your disabilities implications areas

invalid.summary: You need to choose at least one option for your disabilities implications areas
